net.akami.mask.utils

Class ExpressionUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.akami.mask.utils.ExpressionUtils

  • public class ExpressionUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Probably 95% of this class will be (unfortunately) deleted soon, replaced by the new expression system, a much faster and more reliable approach.

      • clearNonVariables

        public static java.lang.String[] clearNonVariables(java.lang.String exp)
        Removes the unnecessary chars to exp, then returns an array of all the variables found. Example :

        5x^2x(y)3((x)@) -> [x^2, x, (y), ((x)@)]. If you want your variables to be simplified (x^2, x would become x^3), use toVariables(String) instead.

        Parameters:
        exp - the expression itself
        Returns:
        an array containing the non-reduced vars.
